Package scs3grp5.entity

Class Camp

java.lang.Object
scs3grp5.entity.Camp
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Identifiable
public class Camp extends Object implements Identifiable, Serializable
Represents a Camp created by Staff and joinable by Students
Since:
2023-11-26

  • Constructor Details

    • Camp

      public Camp(String name, String location, Date startDate, Date endDate, Date closingDate, int participantSlots, int campCommSlots, Staff staffInCharge, Collection<Faculty> openTo)
      Construct Camp object exhausively
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the camp
      location - Location where the camp is held
      startDate - The camp's first day
      endDate - The camp's last day
      closingDate - Registration's Last Date
      participantSlots - Total slots for participants (not camp committee)
      campCommSlots - Total slots for camp committee members (not participants)
      staffInCharge - The staff in charge of the camp (cannot be changed)
      openTo - The faculty that the camp is opened to

    • Camp

      public Camp(Staff staffInCharge)
      Constructs Camp object minimally.
      Parameters:
      staffInCharge - The staff-in-charge is the only required attribute of a Camp (and unmodifiable after creation)
